--------------------
<Text: "Out of the Black" is a song written by Mike Kerr and Ben Thatcher of British rock duo Royal Blood.>
Triplets:<Royal Blood
1:
--------------------
Text: Out of the Black (song):  The song was originally recorded by the duo for release as a single, appearing on the band's debut single of the same name, released by Black Mammoth Records on 11 November 2013.

Triplets:<Out of the Black
2:
--------------------
Text: Out of the Black (song):  The track later appeared as the opening track on the band's debut extended play "Out of the Black", and as the opening track on the band's eponymous debut studio album, "Royal Blood".
Triplets:<Out of the Black
4:
--------------------
Text: Out of the Black (song):  It was also used in a featurette for the Netflix series "Daredevil" at the 2015 New York Comic Con.
Triplets:<Out of the Black
5:
--------------------
Text: Out of the Black (song):  The song was also the official theme song for the 2016 professional wrestling event "WWE Roadblock".
Triplets:<Out of the Black
6:
--------------------
Text: Out of the Black (song):  This song has also been covered by Billie Marten.
